## Matrix4x4.multiplyAffine() method

Multiplies two Matrix4x4's which present affine transformations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static multiplyAffine(m1: Matrix4x4, m2: Matrix4x4, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```
